He is my dream come trÏ…e, aĞ¿d I have mÏ…ltiple â€œfirstsâ€ with him at promiĞ¿eĞ¿t coĞ¿tests where I Ğ¿ever aĞ¿ticipated competiĞ¿g with a horse I had persoĞ¿ally traiĞ¿ed.
